channel.title: How do i make my server a ham?
channel.description:
How do i make my server a ham? It doesn't require a download except for hamachi but i need it so people can access my server.
If you know please post. Thank you
~lele~[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 03:25:38 PM[/size][hr]How?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 03:27:39 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?
